items.title: Notre Dame Football: Navy Midshipmen Q&A with Mitchell Northam
items.summary: Folks,,, I know it’s been a bit of a hiatus from an Opponent Q&A perspective, but I’m happy to be back for what will surely be a straightforward, easy, boring game against the Navy Midshipmen for our Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team, per usual in this annual rivalry game. Our Fighting Irish won an […]

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: The 6-2 Notre Dame Fighting Irish are currently ranked #10 in the college football playoff rankings, and are eyeing not just a place at the table — but ownership of the table as well (to host a playoff game). This week Notre Dame plays host to wookie-life-debt-scheduling-partner, Navy. The Middies could have been useful this […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame is taking down all of its fake rivals
items.summary: Joshua and Brendan open the pod machine without Jude (on special assignment) to bring you a Notre Dame football show worthy of your ears. items.title: FOOTBALL SCHEDULE: Notre Dame and Auburn to play home and home
items.summary: It’s finally happening. Notre Dame fans will be able to cross Auburn off the list of teams the Irish haven’t played. From the ND press release: Notre Dame Football Announces Series with Auburn SOUTH BEND, Ind. – The University of Notre Dame football team has announced that Notre Dame and Auburn will play Sept. 25, 2027, at Notre Dame Stadium, […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Hot and Cold Takes Against The Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: How’d We Do Last Week? Wildly Inaccurate This is just bad. Chowder is not in fact, overrated. It is delicious. items.title: When, where, and how to watch #10 Notre Dame vs Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: This will be the first Notre Dame vs Navy game in history to be played at night in South Bend. There is a whole lot of extra juice for this game now that the Irish were ranked #10 in the initial college football playoff rankings. It’s funny how we were looking at this game just […]

items.title: Notre Dame #10 in CFP Rankings, but better odds to win national title
items.summary: The first set of College Football Playoff rankings are out and what do you know… the Notre Dame Fighting Irish are ranked #10 — just like in the AP Top 25 and the Coaches Poll. All of the talk and all of the parsing what win or what loss means more, and the committee did […]

items.title: Will Notre Dame cover the 25.5 points spread against Navy?
